tool_description:
Know your Today Rasipalan in Tamil, English, Hindi Languages.
Daily Astrology Quotes and Weekly Astrology Quotes api available.
name: Daily Astrology Rasipalan
title: Daily Astrology Rasipalan

api_list.name: Fetch Weekly Rasiapalan
api_list.description:
This end points takes a 'GET' request with sign and language string as a parameter and returns a respected weekly astrology quotes. (Every Wednesday it will return astrology quotes for 7 days from the day).

**Sign GET Digits**
1 - Aries
2 - Taurus
3 - Gemini
4 - Cancer
5 - Leo
6 - Virgo
7 - Libra
8 - Scorpius
9 - Sagittarius
10 - Capricornus
11 - Aquarius
12 - Pisces

Using this sign id to fetch respected sign quotes.

**For Language**
en - English
ta - Tamil
ml - Malayalam
hi - Hindi

and more...
